description.narrative: Train farmer groups in sustainable and renewable energies, organic farming, food forests and tree nurseries. Farmers will be trained in basket cooking, the use of food warmers and briquette making. They will produce energy saving stoves for installation to 3 new groups of 45 farmers. Each household will install three stoves. New groups will be trained on installation of tree and fruit nurseries. Two new tree nurseries will be established. Further training will involve establishment of food forests and using permaculture and sustainable organic farming methods. Three tubular bio-gas units will be constructed to increase awareness and training in use of bio-gas. Create a small shelter on the grounds for caretaker and visiting volunteers.
